Guwahati Mini Marathon

Meet Shiva Thapa.

The Guwahati Mini Marathon (10km run)
Sunday, 16 October.

This event is not just a run but a platform to meet someone who can teach life lessons and share experiences that can be very inspiring for everyone.

It's a chance for everyone to meet our very own Olympian Star, Shiva Thapa.

Shiva Thapa receiving the Arjuna award from the Hon'ble President of India.

On Spot Registration

Students - Rs.50

Others - Rs.100

Venue: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, Guwahati.

Time: 4:30 a.m.

TRACK

Length: The track is of 10 km.

Starting point: Nehru Stadium, Guwahati.

End point: Don Bosco School, Panbazar.

More info coming soon.
